statements: DELETE FROM assistance_programs WHERE program_name = 'Food Assistance' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM eligibility_criteria WHERE program_id = 100 AND income_requirement < 50000;
DELETE FROM eligibility_criteria WHERE program_id = 500 AND age_requirement > 18;
DELETE FROM beneficiaries WHERE program_id = 1 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM eligibility_criteria WHERE minimum_age > 18 AND required_income < 50000;
DELETE FROM program_beneficiaries WHERE beneficiary_id = 100 AND program_id = 1;
DELETE FROM assistance_programs WHERE program_name = 'Food Assistance Program';
